messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content:
The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader.
MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

messages.title: DEMAND BETTER FROM POLITICIANS
messages.content:
Lib Dem Ben J Martin has been working across part at Swale Borough Council, improving housing services, holding developers to account and championing higher environmental standards.
In parliament Ben J Martin will be working for more realistic housing targets which deliver the right type of houses for local people, with infrastructure and jobs to support them.
A Liberal Democrat government will revoke article 50 to end the Brexit chaos, invest in public services such as the NHS, use the economic boost to fund neighbourhood policing, investing in NHS and schools.

messages.title: BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR BRITAIN
messages.content:
Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will revoke article 50 to end the Brexit chaos.

Ben J Martin has been working across parties at Swale Borough Council to improve housing services, hold developers to account and champion higher environmental standards. In parliament, he will work for more realistic housing targets that deliver the right type of houses for local people, with infrastructure and jobs to support them.
Invest in public services such as the NHS, use the economic boost to fund neighbourhood policing, investing in NHS and schools.
